Questions:
The concept of multiple inheritance is implemented in Java by ____ 
(i.) extending two or more classes 
(ii.) extending one class and implementing one or more interfaces 
(iii.) implementing two or more interfaces 
(iv.) all of these
Which of these keywords is used by a class to use an interface defined previously?.

Correct Answer: A. an interface that defines methods to read primitive data types.
Wrong Answer 1: B. an abstract class defined in java.io.
Wrong Answer 2: C. a class we can use to read primitive data types.
Wrong Answer 3: D. an interface that defines methods to open files.
Wrong Answer 4: A. an interface that defines methods to read primitive data types.

Questions: _________ is a feature that allows one interface to be used for a general class of actions.
Which of the following statements correctly describes an interface?
Correct Answer: C. It's a type of abstract class.
Wrong Answer 4: C. It's a type of abstract class.

Questions: Interface methods can be declared with which the following modifiers?
The fields in an interface are implicitly specified as,
Which of the following is  not true?
Correct Answer: (c)     An interface can implement another interface.
Wrong Answer 1: (a)     An interface can extend another interface.
Wrong Answer 2: (b)     A class which is implementing an interface must implement all the methods of the interface.
Wrong Answer 3: (d)     An interface is a solution for multiple inheritance in java.
Wrong Answer 4: (c)     An interface can implement another interface.

Questions: When an overridden method is called from within a subclass, it will always   refer to the version of that method defined by the

The concept of multiple inheritance is implemented in Java by
I.         Extending two or more classes.
II.         Extending one class and implementing one or more interfaces.
III.       Implementing two or more interfaces.
Which of these field declarations are legal within the body of an interface?
Which of the following statements is  true?
Correct Answer: (a) The keyword extends is used to specify that an interface inherits from another interface
Wrong Answer 1: (a) The keyword extends is used to specify that an interface inherits from another interface
Wrong Answer 2: (b) The keyword extends is used to specify that a class inherits from an interface
Wrong Answer 3: (c) The keyword implements is used to specify that an interface inherits from another interface
Wrong Answer 4: (d) The keyword implements is used to specify that a class inherits from another class
